​- Combines the comfort of a wireless bra with the lifting effect of a wired bra.

- ​Newly developed three-dimensional resin parts are built into the cups to provide a shaping effect without sacrificing the comfort of a wireless bra.
- The cross component stops the cups from spreading and maintains the contoured form.
- The cross component provides support and upward lift.
- No wires or resin parts at the bottom of the cup.

items.longDescription:
- Made with ultra-stretch denim that has an expansion rate of over 55% and recovery rate of over 89%, which is the best stretch in the UNIQLO jeans collection.
- Good kickback, so the knee area doesn't lose shape even after wearing them for a long time.
- Feels smooth against the skin, and despite being a slim and skinny silhouette, they are soft and comfortable when worn.
- Mid-rise with just the right amount of rise and depth, makes it easy to coordinate with.
- We were very particular about the size, shape, and positioning of the back pockets, to make these jeans look even more flattering from behind.
- Used a curve belt at the waist, so that they fit around the hips, and are designed to prevent them from sliding down after a while.
- Conducted study after study to achieve a special processing technology for a black color that does not gather dust.

items.longDescription:
OTTAIPNU

OTTAIPNU is a textile brand developed by Masaru Suzuki. Focusing on vivid print textiles, he has developed a collection of umbrellas, bags, towels, handkerchiefs and more that showcase the intrinsic charm of the fabric.

Masaru Suzuki
Textile Designer
He has taken part in projects and collaborations with various brands inside and outside of Japan. Besides textiles, he provides patterns and designs centered on his own textiles, for use in furniture and architectural spaces.

©OTTAIPNU All right Reserved
